0: - Refactored the update button. NEAT Player will no longer automatically check for updates on plugin start.
1: If an update is available, the Patch Notes panel will appear containing information about the update and a button to download.
2: When clicked, the Download button will immediately download the appropriate latest version of NEAT Player to your Downloads folder.
3: - Significantly improved the update pipeline in preparation of store migration.
5: - Cleaned up and deleted unused code.
